name: Blood Run Free
description:
Top 3 overall Free App, Top 2 overall Free game in Russia!

One against 30000, how many can you kill before you die?

You are a skillful Blade Master. You don't kill pigs, you don't fight angry birds, nor do you save the princess.

Your task is to paint the path with human blood.

Fight against horde of swordsmen!
Dodge Spearmen's attack and Slash them into half!
Break the Shield Master's defense!
Deflect Flying Daggers!
Charge up Super attack and send Giants to their graves!
Dodge Rain of Arrows!

features:
SLICK ACTION
INTENSE COMBAT
BLOOD AND MORE BLOOD
SIMPLE CONTROL
HIGHLY ADDICTIVE
No In-App Purchase!

Can you handle the excitement?

An Endless Run for the Real Man.
Be A Man, play The Right Game.

Experience 13 stages of Training Camp in the Free version!
unlock the Full version within game for
---2 type of Endless Run
---40+ missions
---game center score
---hours of fun
